messages.subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Homeschooling picture book
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/8/04 6:51:54 AM, Mattamandab@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/04 6:51:54 AM, Mattamandab@... writes:

<< Does anyone know of any picture books like this? When I searched
"homeschool books" in the library and online, I only seem to get books
about
homeschooling for adults like The Unschooling Handbook, etc. >>


I somehow didn't get the original post this came from, but if you're
looking
for a picture book about homeschooling, there is a book called _I Am a
Homeschooler_ by J. Voetberg. I had it out of our library a few years ago,
when I was first interested in homeschooling. The main character, if I
recall correctly, is a girl who lives in a rural setting. It didn't strike
me as overly school-at-home-y at the time, but that was before I really
knew much about unschooling <g>.

Karen
